definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Lian Shou all have not pulled to him.
Simon Peter motioned to this disciple and said, "Ask him which one he means."
sentences.chinese: 西门彼得说，主阿，不但我的脚，连手和头也要洗。

sentences.english: He was too weak even to lift his hand.
sentences.chinese: 他虚弱得连手都抬不起来。

sentences.english: I was like frozen there and I didn't even know where to put my hands.
sentences.chinese: 我就像冻在那一样，甚至连手都不知该放哪儿。

sentences.english: Simon Peter saith unto him, Lord, not my feet only, but also [my] hands and [my] head.
sentences.chinese: 西门彼得说，主阿，不但我的脚，连手和头也要洗。

sentences.english: At the next stage, they wanted to link up with their old partners.
sentences.chinese: 下一阶段，他们想要和旧的伙伴连手。

sentences.english: They trussed up the captives hand and foot and dumped them in the back of the lorry.
sentences.chinese: 他们把俘虏们连手带脚捆了起来，丢在卡车的后面。

sentences.english: Even handball teams used new software to spy on rivals' tactics.
sentences.chinese: 就连手球队也采用新软件来刺探对手的战术。

sentences.english: See, I don't even have to move my arm to see the time.
sentences.chinese: 你瞧，我要看时间，就连手都不用转。

sentences.english: Between us，even a touch of the hand would not occur.
sentences.chinese: 我们之间，连手也不要拉一下。

sentences.english: Simon Peter saith unto him, Lord, not my feet only, but also my hands and my head.
sentences.chinese: 西门彼得说，主阿，不但我的脚，连手和头也要洗。

definition: to hold/to grasp/to clench (one's fist)/to master/classifier: a handful
to attempt all tasks at once/to manage every detail regardless of its importance
empty-handed/unarmed/(painting, embroidery etc) without following a model/(abbr. for 空手道[kong1 shou3 dao4]) karate
hand and foot/movement of limbs/action/trick/step in a procedure (CL: 道[dao4])
